entry.title: Introduction
entry.content:
author: Jack —-

Welcome to Smalls.World

Smalls.world is my new personal website. I’ll use it mostly to do blog-style posts. Some topics you might see include:

  1. Birding and site reviews
    • Full overview of local birding sites, similar to the NJ Audobon Birding Trails site.
  2. Alternate Movie Universe takes
  3. Computer Projects
  4. Wildcard
    • Books, drawing, regional domestic beer, who knows

Some topics you might see include: Birding and site reviews Full overview of local birding sites, similar to the NJ Audobon Birding Trails site.
